data.message:
s Facebook has chosen to use the software to steal my personal information, I said the following: today, 5 December 2014, in response to the new guidelines Facebook under articles L.111, 112 and 113 of the law of intellectual property, I declare my keeping of all my personal data, drawings, paintings, images, text, etc. Posted on my profile since the day I opened my account. Any commercial use of the foregoing requires written agreement at the time.
Under this authorization, I announced on Facebook that it is strictly prohibited to disclose, copy, distribute, broadcast, or take any other action against me based on this account and/or contents. The above procedures apply to employees, students, agents and/or other staff under the supervision of Facebook.
Contents include my profile information. Anyone violating my privacy law (UCC 1 1-308-308 1-103 and
